sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { LabelsContext, DataContext } from '../pages/_app'; import Image from './Image'; import Section from './Section'; const NationalTeam = () => { const labels = useContext(LabelsContext); const { nationalTeam } = useContext(DataContext); return (
{ labels.played }
{ nationalTeam.totalGamesCount }
{ labels.games }
{ labels.scored }
{ nationalTeam.totalGoalsCount } { labels.goals }
{ labels.won }
{ nationalTeam.totalTrophiesCount } { labels.trophies }
{ labels.made }
{ nationalTeam.totalAssistsCount } { labels.assists }
) } export default NationalTeam;
